title: Build premium makeup e-commerce website with AI shade scanner

requirements.text: Create a mobile-friendly app-like interface with a hamburger menu (‚ò∞) that slides in smoothly from the side when clicked

quotes: Phone par kholne se ye ek real app jaisi dikhti hai. Isme ek Hamburger Menu (‚ò∞) hai jo click karne par smoothly side se bahar aata hai

acceptanceCriteria: Hamburger menu icon visible in header
Menu slides in from left side with smooth animation
Menu contains navigation links
Menu closes when clicking outside or on close button

requirements.text: Implement dark mode and light mode toggle with moon/sun icon (üåô/‚òÄÔ∏è) in the header that switches the entire website theme instantly

quotes: Upar ek Moon/Sun (üåô/‚òÄÔ∏è) icon diya gaya hai. Isko dabane se poori website ka color ek second mein Dark ya Light theme mein badal jata hai

acceptanceCriteria: Toggle icon visible in header (moon for dark mode, sun for light mode)
Clicking toggle switches between dark and light themes
Theme change applies to entire website instantly
Theme preference persists across page reloads

requirements.text: Add a hero section with a looping video background (premium makeup theme) that autoplays without sound

quotes: Website kholte hi sabse upar ek premium makeup video automatically bina aawaz ke play hoti hai

acceptanceCriteria: Video plays automatically on page load
Video is muted by default
Video loops continuously
Video serves as background for hero section content

requirements.text: Create an AI Shade Scanner feature that allows users to upload a photo (file select) and receive AI-powered makeup shade recommendations using multimodal vision analysis

quotes: User apni photo upload kar sake (file select karke)
Uploaded photo ko analyze karke shade recommendation de (using built-in multimodal vision)

acceptanceCriteria: File upload interface with 'Start Scan' or similar button
Displays loading state during analysis (approximately 2-3 seconds)
Backend processes uploaded image using multimodal vision capabilities
Returns personalized shade recommendation (e.g., 'Neutral Olive', 'Warm Beige')
Displays recommendation result to user with visual feedback

requirements.text: Build a product grid displaying three makeup products (Foundation, Lip Gloss, Eyeliner) with hover effects that scale the image and reveal a 'Quick Add +' button

quotes: 3 products hain (Foundation, Lip Gloss, Eyeliner). Jab koi mouse unke upar le jata hai, toh photo thodi badi hoti hai aur 'Quick Add +' ka button smoothly upar aata hai

acceptanceCriteria: Three product cards displayed in grid layout
Products are Foundation, Lip Gloss, and Eyeliner
On hover, product image scales up slightly
On hover, 'Quick Add +' button slides in smoothly
Products include name, price, and image
Grid is responsive on mobile devices

requirements.text: Implement a slide-in cart drawer that appears from the right side when products are added, automatically calculates total price, and displays all cart items

quotes: Product add karne par right side se ek sundar sa Cart Drawer bahar nikal kar aata hai. Ye automatically total price (math) calculate karta hai

acceptanceCriteria: Cart drawer slides in from right when product is added
Displays all items in cart with name, quantity, and price
Automatically calculates and displays total price
Allows quantity adjustment for each item
Allows item removal from cart
Cart drawer can be closed by user

requirements.text: Add WhatsApp checkout functionality with phone number 8709162269 that generates a pre-filled message containing all cart items and total bill, opening WhatsApp web link when user clicks 'Checkout via WhatsApp'

quotes: Jab user 'Checkout via WhatsApp' dabata hai, toh cart ke saare items ke naam aur total bill ka ek professional message automatically type hokar seedha aapke WhatsApp par aa jata hai

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout button labeled 'Checkout via WhatsApp' in cart drawer
Clicking button generates formatted message with all cart items and prices
Message includes total bill amount
Opens WhatsApp web link (wa.me/918709162269) with pre-filled message
Message format is professional and easy to read

constraints: Use built-in multimodal vision capabilities for AI shade analysis, not external AI services
WhatsApp integration must use wa.me link format, not direct API integration
Video background should use placeholder/sample video content
nonGoals: Real-time camera access or live video feed for shade scanner
Integration with external AI services like OpenAI Vision API
